skins.selfIntroduction: I am the Kagerou-class... or rather, the second ship of the Shiranui-class, Shiranui. People mistakenly think my name refers to ghosts, but it is merely the name of a natural phenomena. I personally prefer to think of my appearance as a "cosplay"... That aside, I humbly ask for your kind treatment, you idio... my dear Commander.
skins.acquisition: I am Shiranui, the second ship of the Kagerou-class... I humbly ask for your kind treatment, Commander.
skins.login: Could one say "long time no see," perhaps...?
skins.details: ... Touch me in the wrong way and you will die.
skins.secretaryIdle2: I am bad at dealing with hotheads.
skins.secretaryIdle3: You're standing beside me because I have a "cooling aura"…? Are you an idiot?
skins.secretarySpecialTouch: You have a thing for ghosts? You really are something...

skins.shipDescription: If you have this much money remaining... then you may visit me and spend it with confidence... A discount, you say...? Of course... Someday, I shall give you one...
skins.acquisition: If you have this much money remaining... then you may visit me and spend it with confidence... A discount, you say...? Of course... Someday, I shall give you one...
skins.details: My will-o'-wisps burn stronger than before... *Giggle*, this is the power of money... I'm merely jesting, of course.
skins.secretaryIdle1: Commander, you can make up for quality with quantity. Believe in yourself and pursue your dreams...
skins.secretaryIdle2: Work diligently and you will only be a fool by your appearance.
skins.secretaryIdle3: I take my work both as a secretary and shopkeeper seriously... If I feel like it... I could offer you a 5% discount.
skins.secretaryTouch: Yes, yes, your wish has been heard. Please make your way yonder to amuse yourself with my will-o'-wisps.
skins.secretarySpecialTouch: Groping a shopkeeper like this... is surely not a turn-on of yours...?

skins.acquisition: I see a chance... to capitalize on the Dragon Empery's famous mooncakes... Commander, would you like to have a taste of the Moon Palace's delicacies? If you buy them in bulk, I'll give you a special discount.
skins.login: Happy Mid-Autumn Festival... I hope I said that right...?
skins.details: Commander, did you come to help out? To thank you, I shall offer you a 20-percent discount on these mooncakes...
skins.secretaryIdle1: Lotus seed mooncakes, osmanthus mooncakes, five-nut mooncakes... If it sells well, it's a good mooncake, wouldn't you agree?
skins.secretaryIdle2: These sky lanterns look just like the full moon tonight. Commander, would you like one?
skins.secretaryIdle3: These mooncakes are one hundred percent authentic, unlike the tech p... Err, I didn't say anything.
skins.secretaryTouch: Commander, you'll have to pay for anything that you touch.
skins.secretarySpecialTouch: Commander, why don't you calm down with a nice cup of tea...? Poured on top of your head, that is.
